mapper.select: SELECT ho.hold_code, ho.item_code, ho.code, getitemName(ho.item_code) itemName, ho.quantity, getsubcode(ho.type) typeName, ho.type, getsubCode(ho.status) statusName, ho.status, ho.note, ho.created_date, hod.hdqty FROM hold ho left join (SELECT hold_code, com_id, nvl(SUM(quantity),0) hdqty FROM holddetail GROUP BY hold_code, com_id) hod ON(ho.hold_code = hod.hold_code AND ho.com_id = hod.com_id) WHERE ho.com_id = #{comId} ORDER BY hold_code DESC

SELECT sd.ship_req_dtl_code, sd.item_code, getitemName(sd.item_code) item_name, sd.status, subcode(sd.status) statusName, sd.quantity, sd.tot_price, sd.ship_req_code, getvdrname(sr.vdr_code) vdrName, sr.vdr_code, sr.ship_exp_date, sr.emp_id, getempName(sr.emp_id, #{comId}) empName, sr.created_date, sd.dlive_date, (SELECT nvl(SUM(quantity),0) FROM holddetail WHERE hold_code = ho.hold_code AND com_id = #{comId}) hdqty FROM shipRequestDetail sd left join shiprequest sr on(sd.ship_req_code = sr.ship_req_code AND sd.com_id = sr.com_id) left join hold ho on(ho.code = sd.ship_req_dtl_code AND ho.com_id = sd.com_id) WHERE sd.com_id = #{comId} AND sd.status in('srd04','srd01') ORDER BY ship_req_dtl_code
SELECT lot, loc_code, item_code, getitemName(item_code) item_name, quantity, hold_qty FROM stock st WHERE com_id = #{comId} AND item_code = #{itemCode} AND quantity > hold_qty
SELECT hold_code FROM hold WHERE code = #{code} AND item_code = #{itemCode} AND com_id = #{comId}
